mapper.sql: id, NAME, parent_id AS parentId, parent_top AS parentTop, cover_image AS image, create_date AS createDate, modify_date AS modifyDate, is_last_category AS isLastCategory, purchase_restrictions AS purchaseRestrictions, cover_image AS coverImage, category_label_ids categoryLabelId, owner_display ownerDisplay
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.NAME, t.parent_id AS parentId, t.parent_top AS parentTop, t.cover_image AS image, t.create_date AS createDate, t.modify_date AS modifyDate, t.is_last_category AS isLastCategory, t.purchase_restrictions AS purchaseRestrictions, t.cover_image AS coverImage, t.category_label_ids categoryLabelId, t.owner_display ownerDisplay FROM dj_basics_goods_category t
,dj_basics_goods_category t1
,dj_basics_goods g1
WHERE t.parent_id = #{parentId}
and g1.category_id=t1.id and g1.buy!=2 and g1.city_id =#{cityId}
and t.id=t1.parent_top
and (t.id=t1.parent_id or t.id=t1.id)
and FIND_IN_SET(#{categoryLabelId},t1.category_label_ids)
GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY t.sort, t.create_date ASC

SELECT id, name, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate FROM dj_basics_brand where id in( select brand_id from dj_basics_category_brand where category_id =#{categoryId} group by brand_id ) ORDER BY create_date desc

SELECT b.id, b.NAME, b.image, b.create_date AS createDate, b.modify_date AS modifyDate FROM dj_basics_brand b INNER JOIN dj_basics_category_brand p ON FIND_IN_SET(b.id,p.brand_id) INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods_category c ON c.id = p.category_id WHERE b.data_status= 0
AND( c.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wordKey},'%') OR (c.id = #{categoryId} OR c.parent_top = #{categoryId}) )
AND c.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wordKey},'%')
AND (c.id = #{categoryId} OR c.parent_top = #{categoryId})
GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY c.sort DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T1.*, IF ( FIND_IN_SET(parentTop, @PIDS) > 0, @PIDS := CONCAT(@PIDS, ',', T1.ID), 0 ) AS ISCHILD FROM ( SELECT
FROM dj_basics_goods_category A ) AS T1, ( SELECT @PIDS := #{parentTop} ) t2 ) t3 WHERE ISCHILD != '0'

SELECT
FROM dj_basics_goods_category where parent_id =#{parentId} and is_last_category <> '1' ORDER BY sort asc

SELECT t.id productId, t.NAME productName, t.category_id categoryId, t.goods_id goodsId FROM dj_basics_product_template t, dj_basics_storefront_product t1 where t.id=t1.prod_template_id and t.goods_id=#{id} and t1.is_shelf_status = '1' and t1.data_status=0 and t.maket=1 and t.data_status = 0 group by productId,productName,categoryId,goodsId order by t1.sell_price asc

SELECT
FROM dj_basics_goods_category where is_last_category= '1'
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%')
ORDER BY sort,create_date asc

SELECT
FROM dj_basics_goods_category gc WHERE gc.parent_id = '1' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dj_basics_goods g, dj_basics_goods_category gcp, dj_basics_product_template pt WHERE g.category_id = gcp.id AND gcp.parent_top = gc.id and g.city_id=#{cityId} and g.id=pt.goods_id
and g.type=5 and pt.worker_type_id=#{workerTypeId}
and g.type=0
and gcp.id=pt.category_id )
